feed.title: Montreal River Harbour - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Montreal River Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:23 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 1.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 12:00 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 1.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 0.2°C
Wind: NE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain or snow. High 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers changing to 40 percent chance of rain or drizzle near noon. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain or drizzle early this evening. Snow beginning this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. Local snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then becoming northwest 20 late in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
